name: Seafood City - Sauteed Scallops with Veggies
description: Indulge in the taste of the ocean with 'Seafood City - Sauteed Scallops with Veggies', a dish perfect for those who love a high-protein, low-carb meal with the benefits of a healthy recipe. This dish balances the succulence of scallops with the crunch of fresh vegetables, all while keeping an eye on your health needs. It's a delectable way to keep your meals interesting and nutritious.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the scallops under cold water and pat dry with paper towels.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the taiwan pechay into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large pan over medium heat and saut√© the garlic until fragrant, about 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cauliflower and carrots to the pan, season with salt and pepper, and cook for 5-7 minutes until slightly tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Increase the heat to medium-high and add the scallops to the pan, cooking for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden brown and cooked through.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the oyster sauce and add the taiwan pechay, cook for an additional 2 minutes until the greens wilt.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
